visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts map chart with the following specifications: Chart type: Map. Chart title: 'International Resellers'. Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color (#002060) for the title and subtitle, and a light gray color (#D3D3D3) for the data labels. Data series: Include a series named 'Resellers' with data provided by the returnData() function. Custom colors: Use a base color of #8383A1 for the map and a hover color of #BADA55. Additional configurations: Enable map navigation, set the map data to 'custom/world-palestine-highres', and format the tooltip to display the country name and links to resellers.

subtitle.text: Select a country to see resellers

tooltip.formatter:
function () { return '' + this.key + '
International resellers
Aquion
BTSoftware BV
SHI International Corp.
'; }

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts map chart configuration is designed to display a world map with data points representing international resellers. The chart title and subtitle are styled with a dark blue color to stand out, while the data labels use a light gray color for readability. The map data is sourced from 'custom/world-palestine-highres', and the series named 'Resellers' is populated with data from the returnData() function. The map features interactive navigation and a tooltip that displays the country name along with links to reseller websites. The base color for the map is set to #8383A1, and hovering over a country changes its color to #BADA55 for emphasis.
